name: acms-google-analytics4
description: Google Analytics4（GA4）と連携するための拡張アプリです。

scripts.package: npm run setup && npm run build:app
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run package && npm run release:commit

scripts.release:major: npm version mejor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync && npm run package && npm run release:commit
